item.title: Nuclear stocks rally as Trump signs executive orders to support industry
item.description: Constellation CEO Joe Dominguez and Oklo CEO Jacob DeWitte joined Trump at the signing ceremony in the oval office.

item.title: Charts indicate this beaten-down beverage stock is rebounding, headed $10 higher, says Carter Worth
item.description: The technical analyst breaks down the charts on Celsius Holdings.

item.title: Goldman says these stocks will benefit from some provisions in the tax bill
item.description: President Donald Trump's tax bill advanced to the Senate on Thursday.

item.title: A trading strategy for this market after Trump causes volatility to spike again
item.description: Jeff Kilburg lays out a put spread trade in the S&P 500 ETF.

item.title: Buy this beat-down internet stock whose shares can rally more than 20%, Baird says
item.description: The firm upgraded shares to outperform.
